alert_offline_over.en: Ruuvi Offline Alert: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} The sensor has been offline for more than ${ai.thresholdValue} ${ai.alertUnit.symbol}.
alert_offline_over.fi: Ruuvi Offline-hälytys: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Anturi on ollut offline-tilassa yli ${ai.thresholdValue} ${ai.alertUnit.symbol}.
alert_offline_over.sv: Ruuvi Offline-varning: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Sensorn har varit offline i mer än ${ai.thresholdValue} ${ai.alertUnit.symbol}.
alert_offline_over.fr: Alerte Hors Ligne Ruuvi: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Le capteur est hors ligne depuis plus de ${ai.thresholdValue} ${ai.alertUnit.symbol}.
alert_offline_over.de: Ruuvi Offline-Warnung: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Der Sensor ist seit mehr als ${ai.thresholdValue} ${ai.alertUnit.symbol} offline.

alert_offline_resolved.en: Ruuvi Offline Alert Resolved: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} The sensor is back online.
alert_offline_resolved.fi: Ruuvi Offline-hälytys Ratkaistu: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Anturi on jälleen online-tilassa.
alert_offline_resolved.sv: Ruuvi Offline-varning Återställd: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Sensorn är åter online.
alert_offline_resolved.fr: Alerte Hors Ligne Ruuvi Résolue: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Le capteur est de nouveau en ligne.
alert_offline_resolved.de: Ruuvi Offline-Warnung Gelöst: '${ai.name}' ${ai.alertData ? `(${ai.alertData})` : ''} Der Sensor ist wieder online.
